content.raw: I was testing by running an unthrottled version of sdf/worlds/revolute_joint_test.world with gzserver and watching the real-time factor with gzstats. As of this writing, the gazebo_1.8 branch was getting a real-time factor between 3.65-3.75, while this perf_transport branch gets between 4.02-4.14. I haven't tested yet on the VRC worlds.
content.html: I was testing by running an unthrottled version of sdf/worlds/revolute_joint_test.world with gzserver and watching the real-time factor with gzstats.
